Name: GUNPIG: Firepower For Hire
About the game: Join alien pest control specialist and possibly shortest merc in the galaxy Bax as he fights to clear Stalwart Academy, a school space station, from a rogue horde of robot space monsters! •Top Down Twin Stick Shooter! •Classic arcade shoot-'em-up action, with 8 levels, 9 weapons and 3 alt fires •Powerups, collectibles and special hidden 'Bax Card' art cart collectibles throughout the game •Full soundtrack by Mike Mirabello (Tower of Guns, Mothergunship) with a bonus track by The Mysterious Breakmaster Cylinder •Twin Stick and WASD/mouse control support
